citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:37pm on
September 25, 2023.
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file for the facility. The
inspector also honked their horn numerous times, waiting 30 minutes before leaving the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:37pm on 
September 25, 2023. 
 
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file for the facility. The 
inspector also honked their horn numerous times, waiting 30 minutes before leaving the facility. 
 
 
End Section
